Title: Memories of Boom Boom Mountain
Writer: Pendleton Ward (created by), Merriwether Williams (story by), Timothy McKeon (story by), Bert Youn, Sean Jimenez
Actors: Jeremy Shada, John DiMaggio, Pendleton Ward, Steve Little
Plot: While having trouble solving the contradictory problems of the residents of a mountain village, Finn recalls where he found the desire to help people.
